item.description: Another great free Summer concert in Town Center Park in Hamden. http://www.hamden.com... This week it's Ashford & Simpson who wrote some classics like, ain't no Mountain High Enough, ain't Nothing Like The Real Thing, I'm Every Woman, & Reach Out And Touch. Not to mention their huge 1984 hit "Solid (as a rock)". This is going to be an amazing night of 60's, 70's & 80's nostalgia. What we need to make it even better is a few cocktails, some food to share and most importantly....YOU!!! If you have any doubts as to what a great evening is in store, just ask anyone who attended Herman's Hermits last Friday. This is what Summers were made for. I will be there around 6.30pm marking our territory. Anyone who needs to call or text me, my number is (203) 927-2534. I hope to see a lot of you there.

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Ashford & Simpson Free Concert
